title: So hype over current match need people to talk about it with while its going.
body: C9 vs CLG right now, C9 with that fucking j4 mid rofl. Then there is the DRAAAAAVEEENN pick. What the fuck season is this.

replies.body: Vayne was a terrible pick. SHe is one of the worse ADC right now.
I agree, doublelift ended up not really doing anything this game.

Vayne in this meta of Heavy CC Tanks that want your ADCs ass. Is just bad, Draven would have been a bad pick as well if Zion had done a Teleport/Homeguard on Sneaky's ass!

XSmithie/Zion did nothing to Sneaky. A blindside Homeguard/Teleport with a Liss/Vi would have shut Sneaky down, but what did we see. NOTHING. #BronzeAgeConfirmed
